post:
Hivelocity provides Dedicated Servers, Colocation, Cloud and Managed Services to customers from over 130 countries since 2002. Our World Class Technical Support Team works on-prem, inside our data centers 24/7/365 and is available to you via phone, live chat and support tickets. Answers are instant and resolutions take minutes, not hours and not days like the other guys. We deploy thousands of new servers and solutions every year for our customers around the world. Let us show you why the Hivelocity way is different and better than what the rest of the industry provides

Data Centers: Dallas, Los Angeles, Tampa, Miami, New York City, Atlanta, Seattle and (Frankfurt coming soon)

Data Center Live Streams

Included with every server:

  • Premium IRP Network Blend of Multiple Transit Providers and Peering Fabrics (Level 3, TWTC, Hurricane Electric, XO, Telia Carrier, Cogent, Century Link, Seabone, NTT) and (NOTA, NYIIX, DE-CIX, TIE, Any2, TPA-IX, FLIX, D-IX)
  • DDoS Protected Network
  • 15 minute avg support ticket response
  • Proactive Managed Services available for Linux and cPanel servers (Windows in beta now)
  • Free 10 GB of cloud storage
  • Data Center Grade Server Hardware
  • Free Inbound transit
  • myVelocity platform (DNS management, IPMI manager, live order tracker, 2 factor authentication, SSL certificates, session manager, server monitoring etc…)
  • Free OS reloads
  • 1Gbps private network for Rapid Restore, Backups, Cloud Storage, etc…
  • Free Migration (certain restrictions apply)

Limited Time Promotion: Quarterly Billing Saves 20%, Semi-Annual Billing Saves 25% and Annual Billing Saves 30%
